participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and upbeat, loves adventure and family time.
participant_1.background: I don't care what the weather is as long as I get to wear my pink hiking boots. I like going to the movies. I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters. I love to grow sunflowers. I am a genius and know over 300 languages.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, enjoys simple pleasures and has a love for baking.
participant_2.background: I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son. I love the smell of leather. I have trouble losing weight. I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium. I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.

content.text: Hey! I just moved to the area and don't know anyone.
Welcome to the neighborhood! How are you liking it so far?
It's great! I'm loving the weather here.
I know, right? It's so much better than where I used to live.
I'm a stay-at-home mom to two little girls.
That sounds like a lot of work! But I'm sure it's also very rewarding.
It is, but it's also very tiring.
I bet! What do you do to relax?
I like to go to the movies, or just hang out at home with my family.
That sounds nice. I like to go to the bakery and buy a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
That's so sweet! I love the smell of leather.
I do too! It's one of my favorite smells.
I'm a genius and know over 300 languages.
Wow! That's amazing! I can only speak one language.
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
That's still really impressive! I can't carry a tune to save my life.
Me too! We should get together sometime and have coffee.
